timeline.bodyText: Google best practice is not to use expected exceptions. As of JUnit 4.13 you can use assertThrows instead.
timeline.author: elharo

timeline.bodyText: ex --> expected in this pattern, to avoid problems with static code analysis
timeline.author: elharo

timeline.bodyText: I suppose this is current behavior, but there should be a message here and I'd prefer not to lock in its nonexistence with this assert.
timeline.author: elharo
